title: UAE Protecting Budding Superstar Isaac del Toro from Comparisons to Pogačar: ‘That’s Not Fair’
content:
UAE is bullish on Isaac del Toro but 'super team' is giving Mexican GC talent room to grow: 'He’s a rider who will have a spectacular level.'

Read the full article at UAE Protecting Budding Superstar Isaac del Toro from Comparisons to Pogačar: ‘That’s Not Fair’ on Velo.
author: ahood
